Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.actions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBecomingPrimaryAction
    Instances of this interface are individual actions executed when becoming primary.
    IGenericBecomingPrimaryAction
    This interface must be implemented by classes implementing custom actions to be executed when becoming primary.
    IGenericPrimaryValidityCheck
    This interface must be implemented by classes performing custom primary validity checks.
    IGenericRelinquishingPrimaryAction
    This interface must be implemented by classes implementing custom actions to be executed when relinquishing the primary role.
    IGenericRoleDeterminationAction
    Common supertype to all generic role-determination actions.
    IPrimaryValidityCheck
    Instances of this interface are individual checks performed to determine whether or not the local cluster node can become primary.
    IRelinquishingPrimaryAction
    Instances of this interface are individual actions executed when relinquishing the primary role.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BecomingPrimaryScript
    Implementation of the becoming-primary action that consists in executing an external command.
    GenericBecomingPrimaryActionWrapper
    Wrapper for a custom becoming-primary action represented by an instance of IGenericBecomingPrimaryAction.
    GenericPrimaryValidityCheckWrapper
    Wrapper for a custom primary validity check represented by an instance of IGenericPrimaryValidityCheck.
    GenericRelinquishingPrimaryActionWrapper
    Wrapper for a custom relinquishing-primary action represented by an instance of IGenericRelinquishingPrimaryAction.
    Ping
    Implementation of the primary validity check that consists in pinging a set of destinations and returning true as soon as one is reachable.
    PrimaryValidityCheckScript
    Implementation of the primary validity check that consists in executing an external command.
    RelinquishingPrimaryScript
    Implementation of the relinquishing-primary action that consists in executing an external command.
    RoleDeterminationActions
    Implementation of IRoleDeterminationExternalActions exposed by the HA context to the HA role determination state machine.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ScriptBasedRoleDeterminationActionFailedException
    Instances of this unchecked exception class are thrown to indicate that an attempt to execute an external command for the purpose of a role-determination action has failed.
